definition: to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: A couple of years ago, though, curiosity overcame caution.
sentences.chinese: 可是，数年以前，我的好奇心战胜了谨慎。

sentences.english: Years ago, my curiosity asked me to invite him to my palace.
sentences.chinese: 我在好奇心的驱使下，邀请他到宫里来。

sentences.english: just to keep you poised and on tenterhooks.
sentences.chinese: 这是为了吊你们的好奇心。

sentences.english: Curiosity is one of the permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
sentences.chinese: 好奇心是构成智慧的一项恒久不变的重要特征。

sentences.english: I had a great curiosity to see a Bengal village.
sentences.chinese: 我怀着极大的好奇心，想去看孟加拉的乡村。

sentences.english: It's a kind of social curiosity, an intellectual voracity.
sentences.chinese: 这是一种对社会的好奇心，一种知识上的贪娈。

sentences.english: The strange round-shaped object stimulate the curiosity of chidren.
sentences.chinese: 这奇怪的圆形物体激起了孩子们的好奇心。

sentences.english: She opened his letter out of curiosity.
sentences.chinese: 她出于好奇心拆阅他的信。

sentences.english: Inquirers We nurture our curiosity, developing skills for inquiry and research.
sentences.chinese: 探究者我们培养发展自己天生的好奇心。

sentences.english: So out of pure curiosity I do.
sentences.chinese: 出于一种单纯的好奇心，我也这么做了。

sentences.english: I am curious and ask some tough questions.
sentences.chinese: 我的好奇心会促使我提出一些刁钻的问题。

sentences.english: Curious to see the changes for myself, I visited Shenyang last month.
sentences.chinese: 怀着眼见为实的好奇心，我上个月参观了沈阳。

sentences.english: Curiosity is the wick in the candle of learning.
sentences.chinese: 好奇心是学习这根蜡烛的烛心。

sentences.english: Intellectual curiosity is about ideas and the need to think.
sentences.chinese: 求知的好奇心来自于新鲜想法和思考的需要。

sentences.english: Harriet’s inquisitive mind led her to become a research scientist.
sentences.chinese: 哈丽特的好奇心使她成为一名从事研究的科学家。
这是否满足了你的好奇心？

definition: interest (desire to know about sth)/interest (thing in which one is interested)/hobby/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hunt for novelty/to seek novelty
